titleStmt.title: A fathers testament. Written long since for the benefit of the particular relations of the authour, Phin. Fletcher; sometime Minister of the Gospel at Hillgay in Norfolk. And now made publick at the desire of friends.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Phineas, 1582-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. White, for Henry Mortlock, and are to be sold at his shop, at the sign of the White Hart in Westminster-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop, at the sign of the White Hart in Westminster-Hall
